part_description: Composed of a tapered top and a wider base, connected seamlessly.
internal_interaction_description: The tapered top smoothly transitions into the wider base, providing structural stability and a streamlined appearance. The seamless connection ensures uniformity and strength across the object, allowing for efficient functionality without visible joints or seams.
external_interaction_description: Designed to interact with other cylindrical components, possibly fitting into a larger assembly. The tapered end may facilitate insertion into compatible slots, while the wider base provides grip or support when handled by users.
